On_Off_switch.label: On/Off switch
On_Off_switch.description: This IPSO object should be used with an On/Off switch to report the state of the switch.

Digital_Input_State.label: Digital Input State
Digital_Input_State.description: The current state of a digital input.

Digital_Input_Counter.label: Digital Input Counter
Digital_Input_Counter.description: The cumulative value of active state detected.

On_time.label: On time
On_time.description: The time in seconds that the device has been on. Writing a value of 0 resets the counter.

Off_Time.label: Off Time
Off_Time.description: The time in seconds in the off state. Writing a value of 0 resets the counter.

Application_Type.label: Application Type
Application_Type.description: The application type of the sensor or actuator as a string depending on the use case.
